With its deal with FSDL expired, reduced production budgets, uncertain fixtures and limited bargaining power, the federation faces a tough challenge in securing a viable broadcast partner, raising concerns over revenues, broadcast quality and club finances.

Gopinath urged for 'war footing' action to address pollution, stressing its importance for investor confidence and national development.

title: Drone attack: Russian oil port blasts, fuel tanks damaged in attack by Ukraine; 3 killed
description: A Russian oil terminal near Volna was hit late Wednesday.  The strike caused a major fire, killing at least two people and injuring several others.  Four oil product tanks caught fire.  Emergency services extinguished the blaze by Thursday morning.  This marks the second consecutive night of attacks on Krasnodar Krai.  Ukraine considers Russian energy infrastructure legitimate military targets.

title: Workplace shake-up: Deloitte to rename job titles for thousands in the US; ‘Leader’ roles added
description: Deloitte is overhauling job titles for all 181,500 US employees starting June 1, 2026, as part of a modernization drive influenced by AI. The consulting giant aims to better align roles with evolving client demands and employee career aspirations. New senior leadership designations will also be introduced, promising greater clarity and market relevance across all divisions.

The court also mandated sharing the ASI's expert report on the site's religious character with both communities.

description: Jharkhand will regulate coaching centres under the Jharkhand Coaching Centres (Control and Regulation) Bill, 2025. The framework mandates portal-based registration and campus-wise licensing, caps operating hours, regulates advertising claims, and sets up district committees and a state authority. It also requires mental-health counsellors, student and tutor IDs, fee disclosure, refund policies, bank guarantees, and graded penalties.

Is Fortnite down? V39.30 update, maintenance schedule and more
description: Fortnite players, get ready for the v39.30 update arriving January 22, 2026. Servers will be down for maintenance starting 4 AM ET. This essential downtime allows for new content and game improvements. Expect to resume playing the popular battle royale game around 6 AM ET. Follow @FortniteStatus for real-time updates on the maintenance progress.

title: MLB trade rumors: Phillies target $7.7mn Red Sox OF for 2026 shakeup
description: Philadelphia Phillies are reportedly eyeing Boston Red Sox outfielder Jarren Duran to bolster their struggling outfield for the 2026 season. Duran offers much-needed speed, defense, and consistent offense, fitting Philadelphia's immediate needs. A potential trade involving Alec Bohm and prospects could reshape both teams, addressing Philadelphia's outfield woes while providing Boston with key pieces.

title: Patrick Mahomes quote of the day: Never lose hope in tough times
description: Patrick Mahomes might be a young player but the Kansas City Chiefs' star quarterback has easily inspired a generation of fans both on and off the field. As many of the Chiefs' fans remain stressed about his potential return to the field in the next season, Patrick Mahomes' words prove that he is not the one to give up very easily.

title: Honour killing in Moradabad? Couple thrashed to death; girl's brother held
description: Bodies of a 24-year-old man and an 18-year-old woman from different communities, who had been missing for three days, were discovered in Moradabad district. Police suspect honour killing, with the woman's brothers arrested for allegedly killing the couple and burying their bodies near a temple.

title: OpenAI concerns: Google AI CEO on Sam Altman; ‘Maybe he’s realised what everyone is worried about’
description: Google AI CEO Demis Hassabis stated no plans for ads in Gemini, deeming OpenAI's ChatGPT ad test a premature revenue push. This comes amid investor concerns about OpenAI's significant spending exceeding revenue, with projections of substantial cumulative losses and unsustainable operational costs for its AI tools.

title: Who is Cece? Twitch streamer at the center of Marvel Rivals Creator Cup controversy
description: Twitch streamer Cecee faced online backlash after a heated incident during a Marvel Rivals tournament.  She insulted a teammate during a live match.  Cecee later apologized, admitting her mistakes as team captain.  She stated she reacted emotionally and failed to de-escalate the situation.  The streamer promised to improve her leadership skills.
